name: Helicopter Combat Assault Gun
description:
Now Game Concept Studio giving you another opportunity to enter in the another entertaining and threatening world of entertainment that you have never experienced before.

Experience the ultimate and 3D gaming experience of Helicopter Combat Assault Gunship
Your city is in danger criminals and drug dealers are spreading day by day, recently your city suffered a very deadliest attack so now people are afraid to go out from their homes, because these criminals and terrorist are moving freely. Police are having difficulties to maintain peace in the city.
Now huge responsibility is on your shoulders you are a leader of experienced elite police squad so now grab your gear and get in the most advance technology helicopters use these advance machinery and especially use your skills to defeat these criminals and bring them to justice

MAINTAIN PEACE!

If you find your targets don’t show mercy on them because time is limited, catch the target with your professional skills. Keep in mind that time is limited to complete the mission
JUST TAP ON THE DOWNLOAD BUTTON AND GET READY TO EXPERIENCE EXTREME THRILLS.

MAIN OBJECTIVES
Defeat the dangerous plans of criminals and maintain peace in the city

MAIN FEATURES
-3D high quality graphics
- Intensive high quality sound effects
-Advance technology helicopters
-11 Different and dangerous levels
-User friendly controls
